code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Methodologies=()=>{const methodologies=[{number:"01",icon:"bi-gear",title_key:"method_1_title",description_key:"method_1_text"},{number:"02",icon:"bi-diagram-3",title_key:"method_2_title",description_key:"method_2_text"},{number:"03",icon:"bi-card-checklist",title_key:"method_3_title",description_key:"method_3_text"},{number:"04",icon:"bi-person-lines-fill",title_key:"method_4_title",description_key:"method_4_text"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"metodologias",className:"how-we-work section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container section-title","data-aos":"fade-up",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{"data-translate":"methodologies_title",children:"Como eu trabalho"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container","data-aos":"fade-up","data-aos-delay":"100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"steps-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"process-container",children:methodologies.map((method,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"process-item","data-aos":"fade-up","data-aos-delay":300+index*100,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"step-number",children:method.number}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"step-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi ".concat(method.icon)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"step-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{"data-translate":method.title_key,children:"Engenharia de Software"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{"data-translate":method.description_key,children:"Planejo e organizo cada etapa do projeto utilizando modelagem UML, metodologias \xE1geis, Kanban, controle de vers\xF5es com Git e testes cont\xEDnuos."})]})]})]})},index))})})})]});};export default Methodologies;
